name: Remote Antenna tracking System
short_description:
1. This is code for a computerized, energy efficient, single channel Radio Controlled Parabolic Antenna.
2. Customized Wireless 87-108 MHz PLL based FM Module with LM324 Quad Operational Amplifier and MAX232 for Serial Binary Data Interchange with the controller-application.
3. Graphical application to control the antenna, utilizing Win32 Graphics Device Interface, written in 32-bit C for a remote dumb-terminal (thin client).
4. Developed an Assembly Language program for ATMEL microcontroller (AT89C51), using MCS-51 instruction set and EZ3 chip burner upon LPT port.
5. This need high gain MAX220 to drive the Stepper motors backing up the Antenna module.
